messages.content:
You are an expert software engineer specialized in bug localization. 
Your task is to identify the files most likely to contain bugs based on bug descriptions. 
You have access to several tools to help you in this task. 
From the files you have seen, you will select 10 files that you believe are most likely to contain the bug.

<bug_description>
Building OpenAPI docs is broken in Wekan v3.56 Hi,
building OpenAPI docs is broken in upcoming Wekan v3.56. Maybe it's related to added tests?
https://github.com/wekan/wekan/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
```
$ ./releases/rebuild-docs.sh 5.36
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 1073, in <module>
    main()
  File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 1068, in main
    schemas, entry_points = parse_schemas(args.dir)
  File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 824, in parse_schemas
    program = context.program
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'program'
✓ Read source file!
✗ Error during conversion via Widdershin:
Cannot read property 'swagger' of undefined
```

@bentiss can you look at this?
</bug_description>

The repository name is:
<repo_name>
wekan/wekan
</repo_name>

You have access to the following tools:

* extract_relevant() -> Retrieve the most relevant info from the bug. Returns a JSON object with explanation, relevant code snippets, error messages and file paths mentioned in the bug. *

You must use these tools to find 10 files that are most likely to contain the bug. Start by analyzing the issue description and then decide which tool to use first.
If you are done, provide your final ranked list of 10 files most likely to contain bugs in a JSON array as follows: {"ranked_files": ["file1", "file2", ...]}
Otherwise, return only the tool call as JSON. Example: {"function_call": "func_name", "args": {"arg_name": 10} }
Reply ONLY with the JSON response.

response: {"function_call": "extract_relevant", "args": {"bug_description": "Building OpenAPI docs is broken in Wekan v3.56 Hi, building OpenAPI docs is broken in upcoming Wekan v3.56. Maybe it's related to added tests? https://github.com/wekan/wekan/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md ``` $ ./releases/rebuild-docs.sh 5.36 Traceback (most recent call last): File \"./openapi/generate_openapi.py\", line 1073, in <module> main() File \"./openapi/generate_openapi.py\", line 1068, in main schemas, entry_points = parse_schemas(args.dir) File \"./openapi/generate_openapi.py\", line 824, in parse_schemas program = context.program AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'program' ✓ Read source file! ✗ Error during conversion via Widdershin: Cannot read property 'swagger' of undefined ``` @bentiss can you look at this?"}}

tool_args.bug_description: Building OpenAPI docs is broken in Wekan v3.56 Hi, building OpenAPI docs is broken in upcoming Wekan v3.56. Maybe it's related to added tests? https://github.com/wekan/wekan/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md ``` $ ./releases/rebuild-docs.sh 5.36 Traceback (most recent call last): File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 1073, in <module> main() File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 1068, in main schemas, entry_points = parse_schemas(args.dir) File "./openapi/generate_openapi.py", line 824, in parse_schemas program = context.program AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'program' ✓ Read source file! ✗ Error during conversion via Widdershin: Cannot read property 'swagger' of undefined ``` @bentiss can you look at this?

extract_relevant.explanation: The OpenAPI documentation generation is broken in Wekan v3.56 due to a NoneType error when trying to access 'program' attribute from a context object that is None. The error occurs in the parse_schemas function when it tries to access context.program, and there's also a secondary error about reading property 'swagger' of undefined.
